trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""> </xref> és <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""> </xref> események.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>és a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>esemény következik be, amikor megváltozik a hálózat elérhetősége.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: NetworkAvailableEventArgs contains the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: NetworkAvailableEventArgs tartalmazza az új állapot a hálózati kapcsolat.

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ahhoz, hogy a hálózati kapcsolat aktuális állapotát, használja a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>és a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>esemény következik be, amikor megváltozik a hálózat elérhetősége.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ahhoz, hogy a hálózati kapcsolat aktuális állapotát, használja a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>, amely azt jelzi, hogy a hálózat elérhető az alkalmazás számára.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely jelzi, hogy az alkalmazás rendelkezésre áll-e a hálózati lekérdezi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>és a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>esemény következik be, amikor megváltozik a hálózat elérhetősége.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ahhoz, hogy a hálózati kapcsolat aktuális állapotát, használja a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>, amely azt jelzi, hogy a hálózat elérhető az alkalmazás számára.</xref:System.Boolean>
